div.h2: WELCOME TO Brooklyn Unit School District #188

p.span: The Brooklyn Unit School District #188 will provide a school environment characterized by high expectations and will empower all students with the skills to achieve their full potential and to become lifelong learners with strong self-esteem.

The Brooklyn Unit School District is committed to creating and sustaining a positive, respectful, and safe environment where learning is valued and promoted. Students are expected to develop an appreciation of learning to become able, confident, lifelong learners who achieve their highest potential. To fulfill this mission, the Brooklyn School District will:

li.span: Engage parents and community in the success of our students
Provide a learning environment with high expectations for students and staff
Improve students’ academics by equipping them with college and career readiness skills
Challenge all students to excel in ways that nurture their individual talents and skills
Equip students with the technological literacy needed to become productive citizens in the global community
Develop respect and appreciation for the rights of self, others, and property.
